fields.label: Bir video ekle
fields.englishDescription: Click below to add a video you wish to use in your interactive video. You can add a video link or upload video files. It is possible to add several versions of the video with different qualities. To ensure maximum support in browsers at least add a version in webm and mp4 formats.
fields.description: Etkieşimli videonuzda kullanacağınız videoyu eklemek için aşağıya tıklayınız. Bir video bağlantısı ekleyebilir ya da video dosyaları yükleyebilirsiniz. Farklı kalitelerde birden fazla video yüklemeniz mümkündür. İnternet gezginlerindeki azami uyumluluğu sağlamak için lütfen en azından webm ve mp3 formatında sürümler yükleyiniz.

fields.englishLabel: The title of this interactive video
fields.label: Bu etkleşimli videounun başlığı
fields.englishDescription: Used in summaries, statistics etc.
fields.description: Özet ve istatistikler vb. alanlarda kullanılır

fields.englishLabel: Hide title on video start screen
fields.label: Başlangıç ekranında başlığı gizle
Kısa açıklama (Tercihe bağlı)
fields.englishDescription: Optional. Display a short description text on the video start screen. Does not work for YouTube videos.
fields.description: Tercihe bağlı. Video başlangıcında kısa bir açıklama göster.

fields.label: Poster görseli
fields.englishDescription: Image displayed before the user launches the video. Does not work for YouTube Videos.
fields.description: Image displayed before the user launches the video. Does not work for YouTube Videos.

fields.label: Telif bilgisi
fields.englishDescription: Information regarding copyright of the video and elements used in the video.
fields.description: معلومات بشأن حقوق الطبع والنشر من شريط الفيديو والعناصر المستخدمة في الفيديو

fields.englishLabel: Type kind, refer to HTML living standard
Source language, must be defined for subtitles
fields.englishDescription: Must be a valid BCP 47 language tag. If the kind attribute is set to subtitles, then srclang must be defined.

fields.label: Display as
fields.englishDescription: Button is a collapsed interaction the user must press to open. Poster is an expanded interaction displayed directly on top of the video
fields.description: Button is a collapsed interaction the user must press to open. Poster is an expanded interaction displayed directly on top of the video

fields.label: Etiket
fields.englishDescription: Label displayed next to interaction icon.
fields.description: Etkileşim düğmesinin yanında gösterilecek etiket

fields.label: Git
fields.englishDescription: Enter timecode in the format M:SS
fields.description: D:SS olacak şekilde zaman kodunu giriniz

fields.englishLabel: Allow the user to opt out and continue
fields.label: Kullanıcının devam etmesine izin ver
Git
fields.englishDescription: Enter timecode in the format M:SS
fields.description: D: SS şeklinde zaman kodunu giriniz

fields.englishLabel: Allow the user to opt out and continue
fields.label: Kullanıcının ilerlemesin izin ver

fields.englishLabel: Require full score for task before proceeding
fields.label: Require full score for task before proceeding
fields.englishDescription: For best functionality this option should be used in conjunction with the "Prevent skipping forward in a video" option of Interactive Video.
fields.description: For best functionality this option should be used in conjunction with the "Prevent skipping forward in a video" option of Interactive Video.

fields.label: Kutu gölgesi
fields.englishDescription: Adds a subtle shadow around the interaction. You might want to disable this for completely transparent interactions
fields.description: Adds a subtle shadow around the interaction. You might want to disable this for completely transparent interactions

fields.label: Git
fields.englishDescription: The target time the user will be taken to upon pressing the hotspot. Enter timecode in the format M:SS.
fields.description: The target time the user will be taken to upon pressing the hotspot. Enter timecode in the format M:SS.

fields.label: Visualize
fields.englishDescription: Show that interaction can be clicked by adding a border and an icon
fields.description: Show that interaction can be clicked by adding a border and an icon

fields.label: Göster
fields.englishDescription: Number of seconds before the video ends.
fields.description: Video bitmeden kaç saniye önce gösterileceği

fields.label: Videoya başlama
fields.englishDescription: Enter timecode in the format M:SS
fields.description: D:SS formatında giriniz

fields.label: Sürekli çal
fields.englishDescription: Check if video should run in a loop
fields.description: Eğer video süreli oynatılacaksa işaretleyin

fields.label: Override "Show Solution" button
fields.englishDescription: This option determines if the "Show Solution" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.
fields.description: This option determines if the "Show Solution" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.

fields.label: Override "Retry" button
fields.englishDescription: This option determines if the "Retry" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.
fields.description: This option determines if the "Retry" button will be shown for all questions, disabled for all or configured for each question individually.

fields.label: Show bookmarks menu on load
fields.englishDescription: This function is not available on iPad when using YouTube as video source
fields.description: This function is not available on iPad when using YouTube as video source

fields.englishLabel: Prevent skipping forward in a video
fields.label: Prevent skipping forward in a video
fields.englishDescription: Enabling this options will disable user video navigation through default controls
fields.description: Enabling this options will disable user video navigation through default controls

fields.label: Deactivate sound
fields.description: Enabling this option will deactivate the video's sound and prevent it from being switched on.
fields.englishDescription: Enabling this option will deactivate the video's sound and prevent it from being switched on.

fields.englishLabel: Default label for adaptivity seek button
fields.label: Uyarlama gezinme düğmesi varsayılan etiketi

fields.englishLabel: Default label for continue video button
fields.label: Videoya devam düğmesi varsayılan etiketi

fields.englishLabel: Warning that the user must answer the question correctly before continuing
fields.label: Devam etmede önce kullanıcının soruya doğru cevap vermesi gerektiğine dair uyarı
fields.englishDefault: You need to answer all the questions correctly before continuing.
fields.default: Devam etmeden önce bütün sorulara doğru cevap vermelisiniz.
